scripts.build-win: cd ../lib && go build -mod=vendor -buildmode=c-shared -o ../nodejs/gobuild/esbuild.dll ./esbuild.go && cd ../nodejs && node-gyp build && mkdirp dist && cp build/Release/binding.node dist/index.node
scripts.build: go build -mod=vendor -buildmode=c-archive -o gobuild/libesbuild.a ../lib/esbuild.go && node-gyp build && mkdirp dist && cp build/Release/binding.node dist/index.node
scripts.clean: node-gyp clean && rimraf build && rimraf dist && rimraf gobuild
